english.segment1: Lord, the worship we bring. Is more than songs that we sing. It's a reflection of our ever-changing lives. The best we have to offer
english.segment2: We don't just lift up our hands. Lord, we lift up our lives. For we know that You are worthy of our praise. To You our lifesongs raise
english.segment3: Rescued from darkness. We are walking in marvelous light. For we are children of the King. SING
english.segment4: You are worthy of all honor. Glory, praise and power. King of the nations. You are holy God, almighty. Clothed in brilliant majesty. Father, Spirit, Jesus
english.segment6: Rescued from darkness. We are walking in marvelous light. For we are children of the King. SING. SING
english.segment7: You are worthy of all honor. Glory, praise and power. King of the nations. You are holy God, almighty. Clothed in brilliant majesty. Father, Spirit, Jesus
english.segment8: Worthy of all honor. Glory, praise and power. King of the nations. You are holy God, almighty. Clothed in brilliant majesty. Father, Spirit, Jesus. Father, Spirit, Jesus. Father, Spirit, Jesus. Father, Spirit, Jesus
